channel.title: Stack Overflow?
channel.description: Okay I have no idea how many people fixed stack overflows and nulls in Devo 7 but I'm out to fix them and I can't even find a tut. So if you can help me fix the nulls please it would be very much appreciated because I left my server on all night for the first time and people were getting kicked off every second. Thanks!

item.title: Stack Overflow?
item.dc:creator: @Torax Torax
item.description:
@Torax wrote:

Yea thanks man, I hope this can help some other people too… Since I’ve done it I had no problems but if I get another stack overflow I’ll tell you. =P

Read full topic

item.title: Stack Overflow?
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

Its probably peeps nulling ur server

add this:

if(playerName == null || playerName.length() == 0) { disconnected = true; disconnected = true; this.destruct(); return; }

under

public void destruct() {

Hope i helped

Read full topic
